Employee.title: Employee
Employee.description: Represents an employee in the PayEase system.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the employee.

avatar.description: The avatar character for the employee.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the PayEase system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: The email address of the user.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Owned by the user (path-based ownership).

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores employee data. All authenticated users can access.

params.name: employeeId
params.description: The unique identifier of the employee.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed to be simple for the PayEase prototype. It separates user data from employee data. User data is private, while employee data is accessible to all authenticated users for simplicity in this early version. This avoids complex roles and rules.
